1: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <sup>4941 </sup> <n>Now these [are] the judgments</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תָּשִׂ֖ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>which thou shalt set</n> לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n>
2: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> תִקְנֶה֙ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>If thou buy</n> עֶ֣בֶד <sup>5650 </sup> <n>servant</n> עִבְרִ֔י <sup>5680 </sup> <n>an Hebrew</n> שֵׁ֥שׁ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>six</n> שָׁנִ֖ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> יַעֲבֹ֑ד <sup>5647 </sup> <n>he shall serve</n> וּבַ֨שְּׁבִעִ֔ת <sup>7637 </sup> <n>and in the seventh</n> יֵצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>he shall go out</n> לַֽחָפְשִׁ֖י <sup>2670 </sup> <n>free</n> חִנָּֽם׃ <sup>2600 </sup> <n>for nothing</n>
3: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> בְּגַפּ֥וֹ <sup>1610 </sup> <n>by himself</n> יָבֹ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>If he came in</n> בְּגַפּ֣וֹ <sup>1610 </sup> <n>by himself</n> יֵצֵ֑א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>he shall go out</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> בַּ֤עַל <sup>1167 </sup> <n>is the husband</n> אִשָּׁה֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>then his wife</n> ה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְיָצְאָ֥ה <sup>3318 </sup> <n>shall go out</n> אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <sup>802 </sup> <n>his wife</n> עִמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n>
4: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> אֲדֹנָיו֙ <sup>113 </sup> <n>If his master</n> יִתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>have given</n> ל֣וֹ אִשָּׁ֔ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>him a wife</n> וְיָלְדָה־ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and she have born</n> ל֥וֹ בָנִ֖ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>him sons</n> א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> בָנ֑וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>or daughters</n> הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>the wife</n> וִילָדֶ֗יהָ <sup>3206 </sup> <n>and her children</n> תִּהְיֶה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall belong</n> לַֽאדֹנֶ֔יהָ <sup>113 </sup> <n>shall be her master's</n> וְה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and he</n> יֵצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and he shall go out</n> בְגַפּֽוֹ׃ <sup>1610 </sup> <n>by himself</n>
5: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> אָמֹ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>shall plainly</n> יֹאמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>say</n> הָעֶ֔בֶד <sup>5650 </sup> <n>And if the servant</n> אָהַ֙בְתִּי֙ <sup>157 </sup> <n>I love</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲדֹנִ֔י <sup>113 </sup> <n>my master</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אִשְׁתִּ֖י <sup>802 </sup> <n>my wife</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בָּנָ֑י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and my children</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I will not</n> אֵצֵ֖א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>I will not go out</n> חָפְשִֽׁי׃ <sup>2670 </sup> <n>free</n>
6: וְהִגִּישׁ֤וֹ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>shall bring</n> אֲדֹנָיו֙ <sup>113 </sup> <n>Then his master</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>him unto the judges</n> וְהִגִּישׁוֹ֙ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>he shall also bring</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַדֶּ֔לֶת <sup>1817 </sup> <n>him to the door</n> א֖וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַמְּזוּזָ֑ה <sup>4201 </sup> <n>or unto the door post</n> וְרָצַ֨ע <sup>7527 </sup> <n>shall bore</n> אֲדֹנָ֤יו <sup>113 </sup> <n>and his master</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אָזְנוֹ֙ <sup>241 </sup> <n>his ear</n> בַּמַּרְצֵ֔עַ <sup>4836 </sup> <n>through with an aul</n> וַעֲבָד֖וֹ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>and he shall serve</n> לְעֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>him for ever</n> ס
7: וְכִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יִמְכֹּ֥ר <sup>4376 </sup> <n>sell</n> אִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And if a man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּתּ֖וֹ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>his daughter</n> לְאָמָ֑ה <sup>519 </sup> <n>to be a maidservant</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> תֵצֵ֖א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>she shall not go out</n> כְּצֵ֥את <sup>3318 </sup> <n>do</n> הָעֲבָדִֽים׃ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>as the menservants</n>
8: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> רָעָ֞ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>is displeasing</n> בְּעֵינֵ֧י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>the eyes</n> אֲדֹנֶ֛יהָ <sup>113 </sup> <n>not her master</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> [לֹא כ] (לֹ֥ו <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> ק) יְעָדָ֖הּ <sup>3259 </sup> <n>who hath betrothed</n> וְהֶפְדָּ֑הּ <sup>6299 </sup> <n>her to himself then shall he let her be redeemed</n> לְעַ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>nation</n> נָכְרִ֛י <sup>5237 </sup> <n>her unto a strange</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יִמְשֹׁ֥ל <sup>4910 </sup> <n>he shall have no power</n> לְמָכְרָ֖הּ <sup>4376 </sup> <n>to sell</n> בְּבִגְדוֹ־ <sup>898 </sup> <n>seeing he hath dealt deceitfully</n> בָֽהּ׃
9: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> לִבְנ֖וֹ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>her unto his son</n> יִֽיעָדֶ֑נָּה <sup>3259 </sup> <n>And if he have betrothed</n> כְּמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>with her after the manner</n> הַבָּנ֖וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>of daughters</n> יַעֲשֶׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>he shall deal</n> לָּֽהּ׃
10: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> אַחֶ֖רֶת <sup>312 </sup> <n>him another</n> יִֽקַּֽח־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>If he take</n> ל֑וֹ שְׁאֵרָ֛הּ <sup>7607 </sup> <n>[wife] her food</n> כְּסוּתָ֥הּ <sup>3682 </sup> <n>her raiment</n> וְעֹנָתָ֖הּ <sup>5772 </sup> <n>and her duty of marriage</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>may not</n> יִגְרָֽע׃ <sup>1639 </sup> <n>shall he not diminish</n>
11: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> שְׁלָ֨שׁ־ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>not these three</n> אֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>he will not</n> יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And if he do</n> לָ֑הּ וְיָצְאָ֥ה <sup>3318 </sup> <n>unto her then shall she go out</n> חִנָּ֖ם <sup>2600 </sup> <n>free</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>without</n> כָּֽסֶף׃ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>without money</n> ס
12: מַכֵּ֥ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>He that smiteth</n> אִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>a man</n> וָמֵ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>so that he die</n> מ֥וֹת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall be surely</n> יוּמָֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>put to death</n>
13: וַאֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>if</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> צָדָ֔ה <sup>6658 </sup> <n>And if a man lie not in wait</n> וְהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>but God</n> אִנָּ֣ה <sup>579 </sup> <n>deliver</n> לְיָד֑וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[him] into his hand</n> וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <sup>7760 </sup> <n>then I will appoint</n> לְךָ֙ מָק֔וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>thee a place</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to which</n> יָנ֖וּס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>whither he shall flee</n> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> ס
14: וְכִי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יָזִ֥ד <sup>2102 </sup> <n>come presumptuously</n> אִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>But if a man</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>toward</n> רֵעֵ֖הוּ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>upon his neighbour</n> לְהָרְג֣וֹ <sup>2026 </sup> <n>to slay</n> בְעָרְמָ֑ה <sup>6195 </sup> <n>him with guile</n> מֵעִ֣ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>him from</n> מִזְבְּחִ֔י <sup>4196 </sup> <n>him from mine altar</n> תִּקָּחֶ֖נּוּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>thou shalt take</n> לָמֽוּת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that he may die</n> ס
15: וּמַכֵּ֥ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>And he that smiteth</n> אָבִ֛יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>his father</n> וְאִמּ֖וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>or his mother</n> מ֥וֹת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall be surely</n> יוּמָֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>put to death</n>
16: וְגֹנֵ֨ב <sup>1589 </sup> <n>And he that stealeth</n> אִ֧ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>a man</n> וּמְכָר֛וֹ <sup>4376 </sup> <n>and selleth</n> וְנִמְצָ֥א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>him or if he be found</n> בְיָד֖וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in his hand</n> מ֥וֹת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>he shall surely</n> יוּמָֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>be put to death</n> ס
17: וּמְקַלֵּ֥ל <sup>7043 </sup> <n>And he that curseth</n> אָבִ֛יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>his father</n> וְאִמּ֖וֹ <sup>517 </sup> <n>or his mother</n> מ֥וֹת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall surely</n> יוּמָֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>be put to death</n> ס
18: וְכִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יְרִיבֻ֣ן <sup>7378 </sup> <n>strive</n> אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>together and one</n> וְהִכָּה־ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>smite</n> אִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and one</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רֵעֵ֔הוּ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>another</n> בְּאֶ֖בֶן <sup>68 </sup> <n>with a stone</n> א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> בְאֶגְרֹ֑ף <sup>106 </sup> <n>with [his] fist</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָמ֖וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and he die</n> וְנָפַ֥ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>not but keepeth</n> לְמִשְׁכָּֽב׃ <sup>4904 </sup> <n>[his] bed</n>
19: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> יָק֞וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>If he rise again</n> וְהִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and walk</n> בַּח֛וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>abroad</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> מִשְׁעַנְתּ֖וֹ <sup>4938 </sup> <n>upon his staff</n> וְנִקָּ֣ה <sup>5352 </sup> <n>[him] be quit</n> הַמַּכֶּ֑ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>then shall he that smote</n> רַ֥ק <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> שִׁבְתּ֛וֹ <sup>7674 </sup> <n>[for] the loss of his time</n> יִתֵּ֖ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>only he shall pay</n> וְרַפֹּ֥א <sup>7495 </sup> <n>and shall cause [him] to be thoroughly</n> יְרַפֵּֽא׃ <sup>7495 </sup> <n>healed</n> ס
20: וְכִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יַכֶּה֩ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>smite</n> אִ֨ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And if a man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַבְדּ֜וֹ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>his servant</n> א֤וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲמָתוֹ֙ <sup>519 </sup> <n>or his maid</n> בַּשֵּׁ֔בֶט <sup>7626 </sup> <n>with a rod</n> וּמֵ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and he die</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> יָד֑וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>under his hand</n> נָקֹ֖ם <sup>5358 </sup> <n>he shall be surely</n> יִנָּקֵֽם׃ <sup>5358 </sup> <n>punished</n>
21: אַ֥ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Notwithstanding</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> י֛וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>a day</n> א֥וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> יוֹמַ֖יִם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>A day</n> יַעֲמֹ֑ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>if he continue</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יֻקַּ֔ם <sup>5358 </sup> <n>he shall not be punished</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כַסְפּ֖וֹ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>for he [is] his money</n> הֽוּא׃ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> ס
22: וְכִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יִנָּצ֣וּ <sup>5327 </sup> <n>strive</n> אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <sup>582 </sup> <n>If men</n> וְנָ֨גְפ֜וּ <sup>5062 </sup> <n>and hurt</n> אִשָּׁ֤ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>a woman</n> הָרָה֙ <sup>2030 </sup> <n>with child</n> וְיָצְא֣וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>depart</n> יְלָדֶ֔יהָ <sup>3206 </sup> <n>so that her fruit</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is no</n> יִהְיֶ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אָס֑וֹן <sup>611 </sup> <n>[from her] and yet no mischief follow</n> עָנ֣וֹשׁ <sup>6064 </sup> <n>he shall be surely</n> יֵעָנֵ֗שׁ <sup>6064 </sup> <n>punished</n> כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> יָשִׁ֤ית <sup>7896 </sup> <n>will lay</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> בַּ֣עַל <sup>1167 </sup> <n>husband</n> הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>according as the woman's</n> וְנָתַ֖ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>upon him and he shall pay</n> בִּפְלִלִֽים׃ <sup>6414 </sup> <n>as the judges</n>
23: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> אָס֖וֹן <sup>611 </sup> <n>And if [any] mischief follow</n> יִהְיֶ֑ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>then thou shalt give</n> נֶ֖פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>life</n> תַּ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>for life</n>
